name: Volcano Dragon Fight_TechPrototype
description:
This is the game prototype for my Unity & C# class. 

The concept of this game is slightly strange, I originally wanted to do a human vs Dragon theme, but in the production process I encountered a lot of Technical problem. so do not feel strange, you will see Dragon, sheep and wolf in the volcanic terrain.

Also, there are some bugs in this Prototype, which I'm sorry about, but I don't have time to fix them. 

Control: 

Movement: Mouse Left Click

Camera Control: Move your mouse to the edges, the camera will automatically move

Pick Up: G Key

Eat: E Key

Use: Space

Drop: D Key

Wear: W Key

Up/Down Arrow: Change in Inventory

There are several things you need to know before playing the game: 

Wearable Objects: Helmet & Clothes

Helmet: Red & Blue Squares

Clothes: Green Squares

Useable Objects: Sword & Invisible Potion

Sword: You can pick it up, press Space Key to use. 

Invisible Potion: You can pick it up, and press Space to drink. After Drinking, it allows you to be invisible for 3 seconds. 

Eatable Objects: Apple of Gigantism & Red/Green Crystals

Apple of Gigantism: You can pick it up and eat it. 

Red/Green: You can pick it up and eat it. 

Sheep / Wolf / Dragon Ai are just wandering around. Don't need to care about them. They are just here and being cute. 

Beware of some bugs: 

There is something wrong about my code. 

Sometimes, when you want to pick up an object and use it, the first time nothing will happen. You have to drop it and pick it up again, then it's okay to use/wear.
